trans-unit.source: Provides methods you can use to extend Microsoft Office Word documents by generating host items for <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> objects and by testing for the existence of the generated host items.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用于扩展 Microsoft Office Word 文档的方法，这些方法为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象生成宿主项并测试生成的宿主项是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Extensions.DocumentExtensions> class contains *extension methods* that are designed to be accessed on <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Extensions.DocumentExtensions>类包含*扩展方法*旨在上访问<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about extension methods, see [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51) and [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6).
trans-unit.target: 有关扩展方法的详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51)和[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6)。

trans-unit.source: The extension methods in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Extensions.DocumentExtensions> class are provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中的扩展方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Extensions.DocumentExtensions>类都重定为向后兼容的 Office 项目，从.NET Framework 3.5 到[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` and `HasVstoObject` methods that are provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project.
trans-unit.target: 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `HasVstoObject` 和 `Globals.Factory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md) and [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)和[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: The native document object to extend.
trans-unit.target: 要扩展的本机文档对象。

trans-unit.source: Do not supply this parameter yourself.
trans-unit.target: 请勿自己提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: When you call this method on a Word document, the runtime supplies this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 文档中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to certain features in your application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，可访问应用程序级外接程序中某些功能。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> object to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> 对象传递到此参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> host item that extends the functionality of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object in an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 主机项，它可扩展应用程序级外接程序中当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <c>Globals.Factory</c> object in your project to the <paramref name="factory" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将项目中的 <c>Globals.Factory</c> 对象传递到 <paramref name="factory" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: A host item that extends the functionality of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个主机项，可扩展当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: In an application-level add-in, call this method to extend any document that is open in Word.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，调用此方法来扩展 Word 中打开任何文档。

trans-unit.source: This method generates a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> host item if no such object has already been generated for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object on which you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将生成一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>主机项，如果已为生成无此对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对其调用此方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to this method on the same <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object return the same <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
trans-unit.target: 后续调用此方法对同一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象返回相同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project.
trans-unit.target: 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `document` parameter is of type <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>, which is the parent interface of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: `document`形参属于类型<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>，即的父接口<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method extends both types: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此方法将这两种类型的扩展：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you reference a Word document, you use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当引用的 Word 文档，你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The native document object to extend.
trans-unit.target: 要扩展的本机文档对象。

trans-unit.source: Do not supply this parameter yourself.
trans-unit.target: 请勿自己提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: When you call this method on a Word document, the runtime supplies this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 文档中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to certain features in your document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，用于提供对文档级自定义中某些功能的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> object to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> 对象传递到此参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> host item that extends the functionality of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object in a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 主机项，该项可扩展文档级自定义中当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <c>Globals.Factory</c> object in your project to the <paramref name="factory" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将项目中的 <c>Globals.Factory</c> 对象传递到 <paramref name="factory" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: A host item that extends the functionality of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个主机项，可扩展当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: In a document-level customization, you can call this method to get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> host item that is in the current customization.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项，可以调用此方法以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>当前自定义项中的主机项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object on which you call this method is not the underlying object of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> host item in the current customization, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>的基础对象不是在其调用此方法的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>主机项中当前自定义情况，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project.
trans-unit.target: 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `document` parameter is of type <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>, which is the parent interface of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: `document`形参属于类型<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>，即的父接口<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method extends both types: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此方法将这两种类型的扩展：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you reference a Word document, you use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当引用的 Word 文档，你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The native document object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的本机文档对象。

trans-unit.source: Do not supply this parameter yourself.
trans-unit.target: 请勿自己提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: When you call this method on a Word document, the runtime supplies this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 文档中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to certain features in your application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，可访问应用程序级外接程序中某些功能。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> object to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> 对象传递到此参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> host item has been created for the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object in an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否为应用程序级外接程序中的当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象创建了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 主机项。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <c>Globals.Factory</c> object in your project to the <paramref name="factory" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将项目中的 <c>Globals.Factory</c> 对象传递到 <paramref name="factory" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> host item has been created for the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已为当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 主机项，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In an application-level add-in, you can call this method to determine whether a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> host item exists for any <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，你可以调用此方法以确定是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>主机项存在任何<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use this method to test for the existence of managed controls that you want to persist before closing or saving a Word document.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你可以使用此方法以测试存在托管你想要在关闭或保存 Word 文档前保留的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `GetVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project.
trans-unit.target: 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `GetVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `Document` parameter is of type <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>, which is the parent interface of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: `Document`形参属于类型<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>，即的父接口<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method extends both types: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此方法将这两种类型的扩展：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you reference a Word document, you use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当引用的 Word 文档，你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The native document object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的本机文档对象。

trans-unit.source: Do not supply this parameter yourself.
trans-unit.target: 请勿自己提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: When you call this method on a Word document, the runtime supplies this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 文档中调用此方法时，运行时会提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to certain features in your document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，用于提供对文档级自定义中某些功能的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> object to this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="Globals.Factory" /> 对象传递到此参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> host item has been created for the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object in a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否为文档级自定义中的当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象创建了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 主机项。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <c>Globals.Factory</c> object in your project to the <paramref name="factory" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将项目中的 <c>Globals.Factory</c> 对象传递到 <paramref name="factory" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> host item has been created for the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已为当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> 对象创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 主机项，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In a document-level customization, this method returns `true` only if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object on which you call this method is the underlying object of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> host item in the current customization.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项，此方法返回`true`才<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>的基础对象是在其调用此方法的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>当前自定义项中的主机项。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for backward compatibility with Office projects that you retarget from the .NET Framework 3.5 to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于实现与 Office 项目 (将其目标从 .NET Framework 3.5 重定为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]) 的向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: In new projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you should call the `HasVstoObject` method that is provided by the `Globals.Factory` object in your project.
trans-unit.target: 在面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的新项目中，应调用由您的项目中的 `HasVstoObject` 对象提供的 `Globals.Factory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `Document` parameter is of type <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>, which is the parent interface of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: `Document`形参属于类型<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>，即的父接口<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method extends both types: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此方法将这两种类型的扩展：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you reference a Word document, you use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当引用的 Word 文档，你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。
